title: Customer Feedback
prompt: Generate a detailed post-service customer satisfaction survey consisting of at least 10 questions. Include a mix of multiple choice, Likert scale (1–5), and one open-ended question. Focus on service quality, communication, and overall experience.

title: Employee Wellness
prompt: Design an employee wellness and burnout assessment survey with questions covering workload, work-life balance, mental health support, and job satisfaction. Use a combination of rating scales and anonymous feedback options.

title: Event Satisfaction
prompt: Create a comprehensive event satisfaction survey for attendees. Include questions about the content relevance, speaker quality, venue experience, networking opportunities, and suggestions for improvement.

title: Product Research
prompt: Draft a user-centric product research survey to validate a new product idea. Include demographic profiling, feature prioritization, pricing sensitivity (e.g., Van Westendorp method), and willingness to pay.

title: UX Evaluation
prompt: Create a usability and user experience feedback survey for a mobile application. Include questions on ease of navigation, task completion efficiency, visual design satisfaction, and friction points.

title: Student Feedback
prompt: Generate a student course evaluation form with sections for content clarity, instructor performance, learning outcomes, and resources used. Include both structured ratings and optional free-text comments.

title: Market Insights
prompt: Build a market research survey aimed at identifying current trends, consumer pain points, and purchase behaviors. Include segmentation by age, gender, and income level. Focus on industry-specific needs.

title: Feature Requests
prompt: Develop a user feedback form to gather prioritized feature requests. Include questions on which features are missing, how often the product is used, and what would improve user retention.

title: Usability Testing
prompt: Create a usability test exit survey for participants. Include metrics such as task success rate, perceived difficulty, time to completion, and qualitative feedback on experience flow.

title: Remote Work Insights
prompt: Draft a remote work productivity and engagement survey. Include questions on tool usage, team communication, isolation levels, productivity tracking, and preferences for hybrid work models.

title: Onboarding Experience
prompt: Create a new hire onboarding feedback survey to measure effectiveness. Ask about clarity of training materials, support from team, timeline expectations, and overall first-month experience.

title: Brand Perception
prompt: Generate a brand perception and awareness survey for customers. Include aided vs unaided brand recall, emotional associations, trust level, and comparison with competitors.
